endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all submitted insurance claims.
Submit a new insurance claim for processing.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific insurance claim based on its unique identifier.
Update information or status of a specific insurance claim.
Remove a specific insurance claim from the system.
Retrieve information on insurance policies associated with providers.
Register a new health care provider with their associated details.
Retrieve the claim history for a specific patient identified by their unique identifier.
Submit approval for a specific claim after review.
Generate and access data analysis related to claim submissions and processing times.
